name: Echo (itch) (LuthorAeron)
description:
Echo is a side scrolling, platforming and action game with puzzle elements, inspired by the Mega Man series. It is a short game consisting of 10 levels with a few bosses appearing at the end of a few of the levels.

 You play as Echo who wakes up in a pile of metal unaware of how you got there, just knowing you must leave. You must defeat enemies and take their powers in order to take different routes depending on what powers you have. Echo can swap their arm and legs for enemy pieces to customize their own attack and movement.

Made in Unity v2019.2.0f1

Controls:

A, D - Move Left and Right

W - gain weapon powerup

S - gain legs powerup

Space - Jump

Left Mouse - Fire Projectile
